---
name: taskfile-workflow
description: Add or update a Taskfile workflow target.
---

Follow the repo rules in:

- .github/skills/workflow-taskfile/SKILL.md
- .github/skills/guardrails/SKILL.md

Task:

- Add or update Taskfile targets in the correct Taskfile.
- If you add a new workflow, document it in README dev tasks.

Constraints:

- Do not invent task targets that do not exist in Taskfile changes.
- Keep changes minimal and scoped.

Output:

- List files changed.
- Include any Taskfile commands used.
